sentences.en: A portable ambulatory ECG monitor is introduced in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍我们研制的便携式动态心电监护仪。

sentences.en: A small-screen portable TV can be a good investment.
sentences.cn: 小屏幕的便携式电视机很值得买。

sentences.en: He bellowed information into the mouthpiece of his portable telephone.
sentences.cn: 他对着手机话筒吼了一通信息。

sentences.en: The keyboard is a large and clumsy instrument as far as portable computers are concerned.
sentences.cn: 就手提电脑而言，键盘就显得大而笨重了。

sentences.en: The latest discs, used for small portable computers, spin 3600 times a minute.
sentences.cn: 用在小型便携式计算机上的最新光盘转速为每分钟3,600转。

sentences.en: The new portable computers are going like hot cakes.
sentences.cn: 新的便携式计算机卖得很快.

sentences.en: The portable device easily knocks down.
sentences.cn: 这种轻便装置容易拆卸.

sentences.en: The portable is a direction of the traditional type-B ultrasonic instrument, and it is the portable type-B ultrasonic.
sentences.cn: 传统的推车式B超检查仪也向便携式方向发展，于是就出现了便携式B超检查仪。

sentences.en: The small portable battery - operated units are most suitable for field work.
sentences.cn: 这种用 电池作电源 的小型便携式仪器最适用于野外工作.

sentences.en: There is a pretty portable pair of steps in one corner of the room.
sentences.cn: 屋角放着一架小巧玲珑的折梯.

sentences.en: There was a little portable television switched on behind the bar.
sentences.cn: 柜台后面有一台开着的便携式小型电视机。

sentences.en: There was a permanent 20-yard queue for the portable toilets.
sentences.cn: 流动厕所前总排着20码长的队伍。

sentences.en: This portable seat folds flat for easy storage.
sentences.cn: 这张便携椅可以折叠，便于收纳。

sentences.en: We bought a colour portable for the bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我们买了一台便携式小彩电放在卧室里。

sentences.en: What I look at is the sacrifice of so much portable property.
sentences.cn: 我的意思是,好大一笔动产就这样付之东流了.

words.tran_cn: [计] 可移植性；轻便；可携带性

phrases.tran_cn: 便携设备，手提设备；移动式设备
便携式收音机；便携式无线电台

trans.tran_en: able to be carried or moved easily
a piece of electronic equipment that can be easily carried or moved
